Author: dragaynite
Text: I always wear baggy old t shirts to the gym because they’re comfortable and I don’t mind them getting disgusting w sweat. But whenever I catch a glimpse of myself in the mirror I look huuuuge and they make my posture look terrible bc it’s impossible to see what my torso actually looks like. On top of that I end up feeling gross bc every other girl is in cute little tank tops :))
